00008 inline float quantize_height(float h)
00009 {
00010     #define QF 32.0f
00011     return int(h*QF)*(1.0f/QF);
00012 }

00015 class t_gridpoint
00016 {
00017     public:
00018         enum
00019         {
00020             IDX_HEIGHT= 4,
00021             IDX_SPEEDMOD_X, IDX_SPEEDMOD_Y
00022         };
00023         
00024         union {
00025             float values[];
00026             struct {
00027                 float x, y;     // für drawArrays
00028                 float disp_height;
00029                 rgbabcolor color;
00030                 float height;
00031                 float speedmod_x, speedmod_y;
00032             };
00033         };
00034         
00035         bool looks_equal(t_gridpoint &other);
00036         
00037         // die folgenden 3 modifizieren height und speedmod_xy
00038         t_gridpoint &mul(float f)
00039         {
00040             for(int i= IDX_SPEEDMOD_Y; i>=IDX_HEIGHT; i--)
00041                 values[i]*= f;
00042             return *this;
00043         }
00044         
00045         t_gridpoint &add(t_gridpoint &p)
00046         {
00047             for(int i= IDX_SPEEDMOD_Y; i>=IDX_HEIGHT; i--)
00048                 values[i]+= p.values[i];
00049             return *this;
00050         }
00051         
00052         t_gridpoint &sub(t_gridpoint &p)
00053         {
00054             for(int i= IDX_SPEEDMOD_Y; i>=IDX_HEIGHT; i--)
00055                 values[i]-= p.values[i];
00056             return *this;
00057         }
00058 };
00059 
00060 class t_grid
00061 {
00062     friend class t_particles;
00063     private:
00064         t_gridpoint *gridpoints;
00065         class t_editor *editor;
00066         int *drawing_indices;
00067         
00068     public:
00069         struct t_interpolated_point
00070         {
00071             int x0, y0;
00072             float dx, dy;
00073             union {
00074                 t_gridpoint *points[4];
00075                 struct {
00076                     t_gridpoint *v0, *v1, *v2, *v3;
00077                 };
00078             };
00079             
00080             t_interpolated_point(t_grid *grid, vec &img_pos)
00081             {
00082                 img_pos.mul(1.0/GRIDGRANULARITY);
00083                 
00084                 x0= int(img_pos.x); 
00085                 y0= int(img_pos.y);
00086                 v0= &grid->getpoint_editing(x0, y0),    v1= &grid->getpoint_editing(x0+1, y0),
00087                 v2= &grid->getpoint_editing(x0, y0+1),  v3= &grid->getpoint_editing(x0+1, y0+1);
00088                 
00089                 dx= fabs(img_pos.x-x0), dy= fabs(img_pos.y-y0);
00090             }
00091             
00092             void add(int nval, float d)
00093             {
00094                 v0->values[nval]+= d*(1.0-dx)*(1.0-dy); v1->values[nval]+= d*dx*(1.0-dy);
00095                 v2->values[nval]+= d*(1.0-dx)*(dy);     v3->values[nval]+= d*dx*dy;
00096             }
00097             
00098             float lerp(int nval)
00099             {
00100                 return v0->values[nval]*(1.0-dx)*(1.0-dy) +     v1->values[nval]*dx*(1.0-dy) +
00101                        v2->values[nval]*(1.0-dx)*(dy) + v3->values[nval]*dx*dy;
00102             }
00103             
00104             void clamp(int nval, float min, float max)
00105             {
00106                 for(int i= 3; i>=0; i--)
00107                 {
00108                     t_gridpoint &pt= *points[i];
00109                     if(pt.values[nval]<min) pt.values[nval]= min;
00110                     else if(pt.values[nval]>max) pt.values[nval]= max;
00111                 }
00112             }
00113         };
00114 
00115         int width, height;
00116         
00117         t_grid(int w, int h);
00118         
00119         ~t_grid()
00120         {
00121             delete[] gridpoints;
00122             delete drawing_indices;
00123         }
00124         
00125         int wrap(int val, int c)
00126         {
00127             return (val<0? c+val%c: val>=c? val%c: val);
00128         }
00129         int clamp(int val, int c)
00130         {
00131             return (val<0? 0: val>=c? c: val);
00132         }
00133     
00134         t_gridpoint &getpoint(int x, int y)
00135         {
00136             return (editor->dowrap()? gridpoints[ wrap(y, height)*(width+1) + wrap(x, width) ]:
00137                                       gridpoints[ clamp(y, height)*(width+1) + clamp(x, width) ] );
00138         }
00139         
00140         t_gridpoint &getpoint_editing(int x, int y)
00141         {
00142             static t_gridpoint dummy;
00143             return (editor->dowrap()? gridpoints[ wrap(y, height)*(width+1) + wrap(x, width) ]:
00144                                       (y>height||y<0||x>width||x<0? dummy: gridpoints[ y*(width+1) + x ]) );
00145         }
00146         
00147 
00148         void paint_pixel_additive(vec img_pos, float d)
00149         {
00150             t_interpolated_point p(this, img_pos);
00151             p.add(0, d);
00152             p.clamp(0, -1.0, +1.0);
00153         }
00154         
00155         
00156         void paint_pixels_additive(int px, int py, float *pixels, int w, int h, float amount, int stride= 0)
00157         {
00158             if(!stride) stride= w;
00159             float *s= pixels;
00160             
00161             for(int y= 0; y<h; y++)
00162             {
00163                 for(int x= w-1; x>=0; x--)
00164                 {
00165                     t_gridpoint &pt= getpoint_editing(x+px, y+py);
00166                     pt.height+= s[x]*amount;
00167                     //~ if(pt.height>1.0) pt.height= 1.0;
00168                     //~ else if(pt.height<-1.0) pt.height= -1.0;
00169                 }
00170                 s+= stride;
00171             }
00172         }
00173         
00174 
00175         void paint_pixels_additive(vec pos, float *pixels, int w, int h, float amount, int stride= 0)
00176         {
00177             int x= int(pos.x), y= int(pos.y);
00178             float dx= fabs(pos.x-x), dy= fabs(pos.y-y);
00179             float v0= amount*(1.0-dx)*(1.0-dy), v1= amount*dx*(1.0-dy),
00180                   v2= amount*(1.0-dx)*dy,       v3= amount*dx*dy;
00181             paint_pixels_additive(x,   y,   pixels, w, h, v0, stride);
00182             paint_pixels_additive(x+1, y,   pixels, w, h, v1, stride);
00183             paint_pixels_additive(x,   y+1, pixels, w, h, v2, stride);
00184             paint_pixels_additive(x+1, y+1, pixels, w, h, v3, stride);
00185         }

00194         void fade(float time)
00195         {
00196             float f= 1.0-time*1.5;
00197             x86_fade_height((asm_gridpt*)gridpoints, f, (width+1)*(height+1));
00198 /*
00199             for(int i= (width+1)*(height+1)-1; i>=0; i--)
00200             {
00201                 gridpoints[i].height*= f;
00202                 gridpoints[i].disp_height= quantize_height(gridpoints[i].height);
00203                 //~ if(fabs(gridpoints[i].height)<0.005) gridpoints[i].height= 0;
00204             }
00205 */
00206         }
00207         
00208         void phys_tick(float time)
00209         {
00210             //~ fade(time); return;
00211             fade(time); return;
00212             
00213             t_gridpoint buf[(width+1)*(height+1)];
00214             for(int y= height; y>=0; y--)
00215             {
00216                 for(int x= width; x>=0; x--)
00217                 {
00218                     t_gridpoint &v0= getpoint(x-1, y-1), &v1= getpoint(x+1, y-1),
00219                                 &v2= getpoint(x-1, y+1), &v3= getpoint(x+1, y+1),
00220                                 &v= getpoint(x, y);
00221                     float height= v0.height*0.001 + v1.height*0.001 + 
00222                                   v2.height*0.001 + v3.height*0.001 +
00223                                    v.height*0.996;
00224                     //~ height*= 0.99;
00225                     if(height>1.0) height= 1.0;
00226                     else if(height<-1.0) height= -1.0;
00227                     buf[y*(width+1)+x].height= height;
00228                 }
00229             }
00230             memcpy(gridpoints, buf, (width+1)*(height+1)*sizeof(t_gridpoint));
00231         }
00232 };
